TopicTitle: Ksp1 mods becoming actual items in ksp2

Articles.Content:
There were certain mods for ksp1 that I loved to use, what about everyone else? 

Personally the extra space plane parts, maritime boat parts, and the GN drive were my top three and would love to know the possibility of seeing these as official ksp parts.

 

Here's a link to something I built using a fraction of the parts included in those mods ->
